subject: File (EVP) uploaded
author: James W. Hyslope
full_text: Hi, Just uploaded one of my newest "evp" tonight. A little girl gives me a DATE of the year that is important to her. She says "1927" You will need headphones here people. I enhanced.....mainly so you can begin to hear where she will begin to speak. Is not much improvement over the original audio, but serves as a "marker" notification when the background audio gets quiter. She sounds so sweet :) I hope we become friends. The file is in my folder "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" the audio is called "important_date_enhanced_evp". The reason I asked for an important date is so I could PROVE that I wasn't just getting some random interferance, or a "natural" spectral recording (the recordings left around locations associated with intense emotions) I wish I had a way of doing these conversations LIVE. Well at least close enough that they wouldn't get bored waiting for me to answer back. This is frustrating :) Don't want to just ramble on here folks. But this is just awsome!!
